script:
1). When were these files last updated?
About three months ago. 
It was in Los Angeles.
They'll do it next year.
2). How long will Mr. Krakov be away?
Since Monday
He's six-foot-three
For four days 
3). You'll phone when you get there, won't you?
Don't worry. Of course I will. 
Yes, you'll phone me soon.
Sure, I won't call you.
